meanings.definition: The supposed ability to move objects at a distance by mental power or other nonphysical means.
meanings.sent1: Some people believe in telekinesis, the power to move things with the mind.
meanings.sent2: In movies, characters with telekinesis can make objects float in the air.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed his telekinesis was so strong, he could make a spoon stir itself.
meanings.sent4: Her telekinesis was like a gentle breeze, effortlessly moving objects around her.
meanings.sent5: The concept of telekinesis fascinated the young boy, who dreamed of having such powers.
